name: tonic
description: Student registration automation for after school lessons and programs

scripts.docs: documentation build src/**/*.js -f html -o docs/generated --config config/documentation.yml
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.check:all: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.build:production: npm run build:frontend && npm run check:all
scripts.build:staging: npm run check:all && npm run build:frontend && ./scripts/version-manager.sh auto
scripts.version:increment:minor: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json')); const oldVer=pkg.version.split('.'); const oldMinor=oldVer[0]+'.'+oldVer[1]+'.x'; require('child_process').execSync('npm version minor --no-git-tag-version', {stdio:'inherit'}); const newPkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json')); require('child_process').execSync('git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m \"chore: auto-increment version '+oldMinor+' → '+newPkg.version+'\"', {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.version:increment:major: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json')); const oldMajor=pkg.version.split('.')[0]+'.x.x'; require('child_process').execSync('npm version major --no-git-tag-version', {stdio:'inherit'}); const newPkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json')); require('child_process').execSync('git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m \"chore: auto-increment version '+oldMajor+' → '+newPkg.version+'\"', {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.deploy:check: npm run build && npm run test
